item.title: Broken Generation
item.description: [[songs/b/breaking_benjamin/ember/torn_in_two.md#i-am-torn-in-two-vyl-wnanory|He sits and he waits, feeling broken and hollow]] [[songs/b/breaking_benjamin/ember/torn_in_two.md#i-am-torn-in-two-vyl-wnanory|Hands held close to his face, screaming, “Why do I bother?

item.title: Never Giving Up
item.description: [[songs/s/stone_sour/audio_secrecy/say_youll_haunt_me.md#i-can-see-the-patterns-on-your-face-vyl-wnanory|Even though I can see it in your face]] [[songs/s/stone_sour/audio_secrecy/say_youll_haunt_me.md#i-can-see-the-patterns-on-your-face-vyl-wnanory|I can’t really explain]] [[songs/s/stone_sour/audio_secrecy/say_youll_haunt_me.md#i-can-see-the-patterns-on-your-face-vyl-wnanory|Just how broken and empty and disgraced]] [[songs/s/stone_sour/audio_secrecy/say_youll_haunt_me.
